title: Up Late with Miss Piggy
description: The fiery Miss Piggy is the first lady of late night.
quote: Libraries have had it too good for too long!
altHero: Miss Piggy in front of a red curtain
alt1: Miss Piggy at a late show desk interviewing Elizabeth Banks
alt2: Miss Piggy singing a duet with Josh Groban
alt4: Miss Piggy at her late show desk
